title: Jennifer Hudson
summary: Jennifer Kate Hudson (born September 12, 1981), also known by her nickname J.Hud, is an  American singer and actress. Throughout her career, Hudson has received various accolades for both her music and acting, including an Academy Award, a Golden Globe Award, a Daytime Emmy Award, and two Grammy Awards. Time named her one of the 100 most influential people in the world in 2020.[1]
